casebody.data:
Diane Gauthier v. Town of Fairfield et al. (9541)

Daly, O’Connell and Heiman, Js.

Argued March 27 decision released May 14, 1991 S. Antoinette Morton, with whom, on the brief, was Derby F. Anderson, for the appellant (plaintiff). *832Roy H. Erwin, Sr., with whom, on the brief, was Roy H. Erwin, Jr., for the appellees (defendants). Per Curiam.

The sole issue in this case is whether the term “owner of land” as used in General Statutes § 52-557g includes a municipality or is limited to a private land owner. In Manning v. Barenz, 24 Conn. App. 592, 590 A.2d 980 (1991), this court held that this statute applies to municipalities.

The judgment is affirmed.
